dmca.title: Mettler-Toledo, Inc.
dmca.body:
Anticybersquatting Consumer Protection Act:

Your prominent use of a domain address (METTLER-TOLEDO.BALANCES.COM) that incorporates our client's distinctive and famous trademark is a violation of the Anticybersquatting Consumer Protection Act. We demand that you immediate cease your use and advertisements of the domain address METTLER-TOLEDO.BALANCES.COM.

Under the Anticybersquatting Consumer Protection Act, a person is liable in an action brought by a trademark owner if the person has a bad faith intent to profit from the owner's trademark and registers or uses a domain name that is identical or confusingly similar to a trademark that is distinctive or famous at the time of registration or use of the domain name. It is our genuine concern that any unauthorized use of the mark METTLER TOLEDO, including use of the mark as a domain name, is likely to be misleading and will create a likelihood of confusion to our customers. Mettler currently operates a website in connection with the domain name METTLER-TOLEDO.COM. Customers of Mettler products and services will naturally expect the METTLER-TOLEDO.BALANCES.COM site to be sponsored or endorsed by Mettler. Diverting customers from the METTLER-TOLEDO.COM web site to the METTLER-TOLEDO.BALANCES.COM web site for commercial gain is harmful to the goodwill represented by the mark METTLER TOLEDO.
